description: Perfect treat snack for the whole family.
keywords: Muffins,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Milo Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180 degrees. Cream together the nuttelex and sugar.
Add 3 eggs to mixture and mix until all combined.
Add milo to mixture and mix until combined.
Sift in self raising flour and add milk and gently mix until everything is combined.

Line a muffin tin with muffin cases. Fill cases with a large spoon of mixture approximately filling 3/4 of the muffin case. Bake in oven for 20 minutes or until cooked through when tested with a skewer.
Sift icing sugar over the top. Alternatively you could ice the cakes with a butter cream icing and sprinkle some more milo over the top.
